name: Curse of the Loop
description:
Every tomb has their own curse - this one just happens to have a sense of humour. Every time you die, you're reborn but copies of you are made that repeat all your mistakes. Learn from and use your past selves to get the treasure and escape the tomb

Use WASD to move and R to restart the level

Made for Ludum Dare 44 where the theme was Stuck in a loop
